title: Squarespace’s Cyber Week continues - grab 20% off before it’s gone
description: This is one of the best deals I’ve seen from Squarespace this year, don’t miss it
content:
Unlike many other website builders, Squarespace isn’t known for offering year-round deals. But right now, you can save a generous 20% on its website builder plans.
